Package view

Class GameManager

java.lang.Object
view.GameManager
public class GameManager
extends java.lang.Object
This class is responsible for rendering the view of the program. It makes a World Object, a Game Setter Object and then makes these two work together in a timer.
Author:
keitaro

  • Constructor Details

    • GameManager

      public GameManager()

  • Method Details

    • createNewGame

      public void createNewGame​(javafx.stage.Stage menuStage, Levels choosenLevel)
      This method is used to show and hide scenes/stage.
      Parameters:
      menuStage - is used to hide the Stage specified here
      choosenLevel - is to create game according to the level

    • createTimer

      public void createTimer()
      Is used to create the Animation Timer. In the timer's handle method it is checked whether the game is over i.e. the user has died three times Method also checks if stage is ended, if it is it calls showSpeedChange method, it also increases the speed for the next stage of the level.

    • hasSpeedChanged

      public boolean hasSpeedChanged()
      Method checks boolean variable speed change.
      Returns:
      if speedChange is true return true else return false

    • playMusic

      public void playMusic()
      Plays background Music by using MediaPlayer and Media Objects.

    • setNumber

      public void setNumber​(int n)
      Method shows points
      Parameters:
      n - is the current score of the player
